<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
<script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
    new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
    j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
    })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-KQQ55SR4');</script>
    <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
    <style>
      .header {
        position: sticky;
        overflow: visible;
        height: 10vh; 
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease;
      }
      .header-hidden {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
        opacity: 0;
      }
      .header__heading-logo-wrapper {
        transition: margin 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease, visibility 0.3s ease;
        visibility: visible;
        opacity: 1;
        margin-top: 70px;
      width:70%
      }
      .header-hidden .header__heading-logo-wrapper {
        visibility: hidden;
        opacity: 0;
        margin-top: -65px;
      }
      .header__search{
        display:none
      }
      .cart-item__totals{
        font-size: 0.5rem;
      }
      @media (max-width: 768px){
      .header__heading-logo-wrapper {
        width:50%;
        margin-top:0;
      }
      }
    </style>
    <script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
      let lastScrollTop = 0;
      const header = document.querySelector('.header');
      const logoWrapper = document.querySelector('.header__heading-logo-wrapper');
      if (!header || !logoWrapper) return; // Prevent errors if elements are missing
      function handleScroll() {
        const scrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
    
        if (scrollTop > lastScrollTop) {
          // Scrolling down: hide header and logo
          header.classList.add('header-hidden');
        } else {
          // Scrolling up: show header and reset logo margin
          header.classList.remove('header-hidden');
          logoWrapper.style.marginTop = '70px'; // Reset logo margin
        }
    
        lastScrollTop = scrollTop <= 0 ? 0 : scrollTop;
      }
    
      function toggleScrollBehavior() {
        if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
          window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
        } else {
          window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
          header.classList.remove('header-hidden'); // Ensure header is visible on mobile
        }
      }
    
      // Initialize scroll behavior based on the current window width
      toggleScrollBehavior();
      window.addEventListener('resize', toggleScrollBehavior);
  });
  </script>
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
          // Target the "BLOG" link in the header menu
          const blogLink = document.querySelector('#HeaderMenu-reads-blog[href="https://frankgreen.com.au/blogs/read"]');
          
          if (blogLink) {
            // Set the attributes to open in a new tab
            blogLink.setAttribute('target', '_blank'); 
            blogLink.setAttribute('rel', 'noopener noreferrer');
          }
        });
    </script>
     
    <script>
      let lastScrollTop = 0;
      const header = document.querySelector('.header');
      const logoWrapper = document.querySelector('.header__heading-logo-wrapper');
    
      function handleScroll() {
        const scrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
    
        if (scrollTop > lastScrollTop) {
          header.classList.add('header-hidden');
        } else {
          header.classList.remove('header-hidden');
          logoWrapper.style.marginTop = '70px'; 
        }
    
        lastScrollTop = scrollTop <= 0 ? 0 : scrollTop;
      }
    
      function toggleScrollBehavior() {
        if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
          window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
        } else {
          window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
          header.classList.remove('header-hidden');
        }
      }
    
      toggleScrollBehavior();
    
      window.addEventListener('resize', toggleScrollBehavior);
    </script>
    <script>
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        // Target the "BLOG" link in the header menu
        const blogLink = document.querySelector('#HeaderMenu-reads-blog[href="https://frankgreen.com.au/blogs/read"]');
        
        if (blogLink) {
          // Set the attributes to open in a new tab
          blogLink.setAttribute('target', '_blank'); 
          blogLink.setAttribute('rel', 'noopener noreferrer');
        }
      });
    </script>
